Package mohannad.soliman

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
mohannad.soliman.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The class that the API calls as it contains the implementation of the required methods. Contains static methods as it is assumed that an object of the Controller won't be needed only its methods.

    • readJSON

      public static boolean readJSON(String fileName)
      Method where user enters path of topology file to be read
      Parameters:
      fileName - path of input file
      Returns:
      True if file exists with valid json format else False

    • writeJSON

      public static boolean writeJSON(String topologyID)
      Method where user chooses the ID of the topology in the memory to be written to disk in savedTopologies.json file
      Parameters:
      topologyID - ID of wanted topology
      Returns:
      True if ID is for existing topology else False

    • queryTopologies

      public static Topology[] queryTopologies()
      Method that returns array of all currently held topologies in memory
      Returns:
      Array of topologies in memory

    • deleteTopology

      public static boolean deleteTopology(String topologyID)
      Method that deletes the topology of the given ID
      Parameters:
      topologyID - ID of wanted topology
      Returns:
      True if topology exists else False

    • queryDevices

      public static Component[] queryDevices(String topologyID)
      Method that returns array of all devices in a topology
      Parameters:
      topologyID - ID of wanted topology
      Returns:
      Array of components in the topology

    • queryDevicesWithNetlistNode

      public static Component[] queryDevicesWithNetlistNode(String topologyID, String netlistNodeID)
      Method that returns array of components belonging to a certain topology having a component whose netlist contains the required ID
      Parameters:
      topologyID - ID of wanted topology
      netlistNodeID - ID of wanted netlist node
      Returns:
      Array of components
